name: Under Attack (lsr351)
description:
Inspired by GMTK Jam 2021 which I took part in, I made another game during the weekend. 

There's two types of health bars. One for ship that you control and other for enemies getting past the screen. The game has three enemy types and three power ups.

Unfortunately I didn't have time to make more levels or fine tune them better. I'm not even sure if the last level is possible so good luck!

Sadly there's no music or sounds this time. Maybe I should spend couple next weekends on more fuller game. We'll see.

WASD - Move
Space - Shoot
Q - Shoot missile (if get the powerup)

Controller is also supported.

PS: The game is not mobile friendly at all. It also depends on the specific screen size.
